sentences.en: Almost happily, the old man battles the mountainous swells.
sentences.cn: 老人几乎是很高兴地和山岳般的巨浪相搏斗.

sentences.en: He had a firsthand taste of life in backward mountainous areas.
sentences.cn: 他直接体验过落后山区的生活.

sentences.en: Most of Northern Scotland is a mountainous region known as the Scotish High - lands.
sentences.cn: 北苏格兰大部分是山区,以苏格兰高地而著称.

sentences.en: Nowadays tractors are used even in remote mountainous regions.
sentences.cn: 现在连偏僻的山区也用上了拖拉机.

sentences.en: Planes parachuted food, clothing, blankets, medicine and water into the rugged mountainous border region.
sentences.cn: 飞机将食品、衣物、毯子、药品和水空投到崎岖多山的边界地区。

sentences.en: The enemy still held some depth in the mountainous areas on his western flank.
sentences.cn: 敌人在西侧的山地区域仍控制有相当纵深.

sentences.en: The fishermen set off in mountainous seas.
sentences.cn: 渔夫们冒着汹涌的海浪出海了。

sentences.en: The island is mountainous and wooded, giving peculiar scope to the qualities of your troops.
sentences.cn: 岛上山峦绵亘,森林茂密, 你的军队大有用武之地.

sentences.en: The mountainous area is prolific in valuable minerals.
sentences.cn: 这一山区有丰富的宝贵矿石.

sentences.en: The ship sank in mountainous seas.
sentences.cn: 那艘船淹没在滔天巨浪中.

sentences.en: The storm heaved the sea into mountainous weaves.
sentences.cn: 风暴中海面上波涛万丈.

sentences.en: They had sojourned in a mountainous country called Transylvania.
sentences.cn: 他们曾在人们称为特兰西瓦尼亚的山谷里逗留.

sentences.en: To build a road in the mountainous area was a real challenge.
sentences.cn: 在山区修筑公路确是艰钜的事.

sentences.en: Valley glaciers are confined to valleys in mountainous terrain.
sentences.cn: 山谷冰川只限于多山地带的山谷.

sentences.en: Varese Ligure is a small town in mountainous country east of Genoa.
sentences.cn: 瓦雷泽古雷是位于热那亚以东山区的一座小城。

words.tran_cn: 多山的；巨大的；山一般的

trans.tran_cn: 多山的，巨大的，山一般的
trans.tran_en: a mountainous area has a lot of mountains
